profileSettings.bio:
A Front-end developer who loves UI effects, animation and dynamic user experience.
I design and develop experience that make people's lives simple.

workExperiences.description: Web design and development (UI & UI) to create website layout by using various HTML, CSS, JavaScript practice via Git repository system.
Ensure security through access controls, backups and firewalls also install and configure software and hardware.

schoolEducation.description: Write well designed, testable, efficient code by using software development practices.

schoolEducation.course: AP Degree in Multimedia Design & Communication
schoolEducation.description: Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to communicate and design ideas.
Monitor performance and maintain systems according to requirements, manage network servers and technology tools.
